SEARCH
Package controller

Class RequestController

java.lang.Object
utils.Base
controller.BaseController
controller.RequestController
public class RequestController extends BaseController
A class that serves as a controller for managing requests. This class extends the BaseController class.
Since:
15/4/23
Version:
1.0
Author:
Si Ming Zhou

  • Field Details

    • masterRequests

      ArrayList<Request> masterRequests
      An ArrayList of Request object type to store all requests in the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • RequestController

      public RequestController(CentralManager centralManager)
      Constructs a new instance of RequestController using the CentralManager of the system.
      Initializes the masterRequest ArrayList with the ArrayList of all requests in the system. (if necessary)
      Parameters:
      centralManager - (centralManager) the CentralManager entity object for the system.

  • Method Details

    • getRequestsByUserID

      public ArrayList<Request> getRequestsByUserID(String userID)
      Gets all the request made by the specified userID provided as an ArrayList of Request objects.
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of the user you wish to get requests of.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Request made by the specified userID provided

    • checkPendingProjectRequest

      public boolean checkPendingProjectRequest(String studentID)
      Returns a boolean value of whether the students request is still pending or has been approved.
      If True, request is still pending and yet to be approved by the Coordinator.
      If False, request has been approved by the Coordinator.
      Parameters:
      studentID - ID of the student who wishes to check his/her pending project request
      Returns:
      True, if requestee ID is the specified student ID provided when request type is "register" and request status is "pending",
      else, False

    • baseRequestStudent

      public void baseRequestStudent(Integer projectId, String type, String studentID, String value)
      With parameters given, initialise a new instance of Request with the information. Then adds this new request created to the masterRequest ArrayList. This method should only be used by Students.
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of specified project
      type - Type of request student is making.
      studentID - ID of student requestee.
      value - new Title to be replaced.

    • requestChangeTitle

      public void requestChangeTitle(String newTitle, String studentID, String projectID)
      Using the baseRequestStudent, this method specifies the type of request that the student is making to "changeTitle" which is used when the student is requesting to change the project title.
      Parameters:
      newTitle - new Title to be changed to.
      studentID - ID of student who is allocated this project.
      projectID - ID of specific project student wishes to change the title of.

    • requestAllocation

      public void requestAllocation(String projectID, String studentID)
      Using the baseRequestStudent, this method specifies the type of request that the student is making to "register" which is used when the student is requesting for a project to be allocated to him/her.
      Parameters:
      projectID - ID of specific project student wishes to change the title of.
      studentID - ID of student who is allocated this project.

    • requestDeAllocation

      public void requestDeAllocation(String projectID, String studentID)
      Using the baseRequestStudent, this method specifies the type of request that the student is making to "deRegister" which is used when student is requesting for his/ her allocated project to be deallocated from him/her.
      Parameters:
      projectID - ID of specific project student wishes to change the title of.
      studentID - ID of student who is allocated this project.

    • requestTransfer

      public void requestTransfer(String projectID, String requesteeID, String newSupervisorID)
      With parameters given, initialises a new request that sets the request type to "changeSupervisor". This method should only be used by supervisors as only supervisors can requst a change of supervisor for their own projects.
      Parameters:
      projectID - ID of specific project supervisor wishes to change the supervisor ID of.
      requesteeID - current Supervisors ID.
      newSupervisorID - replacement Supervisor's ID.

    • submitRequest

      public void submitRequest(Request request)
      Adds request object specified to masterRequests ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      request - Request object you wish to add to masterRequest

    • rejectAllRemainingProjects

      public void rejectAllRemainingProjects(String supervisorID)
      Rejects all remaining pending requests belonging to the supervisor whose ID is provided.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - ID of supervisor whos remaining projects you wish to reject.

    • processRequest

      public boolean processRequest(Request request, String decision)
      Method to process request according to what decision is chosen by the Coordinator.
      If coordinator chooses 'Y', the request will be approved and updated in the masterRequest using this method.
      If coordinator chooses 'N', the request will be rejected and updated in the masterRequest using this method.
      Parameters:
      request - Request object which Coordinator chooses to process
      decision - Decision of Coordinator to approve or reject the request, can only be 'Y' or 'N'.
      Returns:
      True, if request if approved. False, if request is rejected.

    • getAllRequests

      public ArrayList<Request> getAllRequests()
      Get method for all requests made (regardless of requestee, status, or type)
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all requests made

    • getRequestByType

      public ArrayList<Request> getRequestByType(String type, String status)
      Gets an ArrayList of requests of the specified type and status.
      Parameters:
      type - Request Type
      status - Request Status
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Request with the specified status

    • getRequestsBySupervisorID

      public ArrayList<Request> getRequestsBySupervisorID(String supervisorID, String status)
      Gets an ArrayList of request of type "changeTitle" for projects supervised by the specified supervisor ID and status.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - the ID of the supervisor for the project
      status - the status of the request to get (use an empty string to get all statuses)
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Request objects of type "changeTitle" for projects supervised by the specified supervisor ID and status
